message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can negotiate a better price. How about $9,500?
Bob, I appreciate your offer but I'm still a bit higher than that. I'm willing to come down to $9,750,  considering the value of the product.  Let's try to make this work!
Hi Alice, I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $9,500.
Bob, I understand your position, but I'm still a little higher than that. How about we split the difference and settle for $9,625?  It's a fair compromise, and it gets us closer to a deal.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts in negotiating. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $9,550.
